comment:
* System service that manages music recognition.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: RECOGNITION_FAILED_NOT_FOUND
variables.comment: Recognition was performed but no result could be identified.

variables.name: RECOGNITION_FAILED_NO_CONNECTIVITY
variables.comment: Recognition failed because the server couldn't be reached.

variables.name: RECOGNITION_FAILED_SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE
variables.comment:
* Recognition was not possible because the application which provides it is not available (for
     * example, disabled).

variables.name: RECOGNITION_FAILED_SERVICE_KILLED
variables.comment: Recognition failed because the recognizer was killed.

variables.name: RECOGNITION_FAILED_AUDIO_UNAVAILABLE
variables.comment: Recognition failed due to an issue with obtaining an audio stream.

methods.name: public void beginStreamingSearch(@NonNull RecognitionRequest recognitionRequest, @NonNull @CallbackExecutor Executor callbackExecutor, @NonNull RecognitionCallback callback)
methods.comment:
* Constructs an {@link android.media.AudioRecord} from the given parameters and streams the
     * audio bytes to the designated cloud lookup service.  After the lookup is done, the given
     * callback will be invoked by the system with the result or lack thereof.
     *
     * @param recognitionRequest audio parameters for the stream to search
     * @param callbackExecutor where the callback is invoked
     * @param callback invoked when the result is available
     *
     * @hide

methodNames: public void beginStreamingSearch(@NonNull RecognitionRequest recognitionRequest, @NonNull @CallbackExecutor Executor callbackExecutor, @NonNull RecognitionCallback callback)
